Serverless After Dark is a weekly hack night at 8:30pm ET on Wednesday nights. It's an opportunity for members of the AWS serverless community to get together, work on their projects...
Marc Fielding will be covering reasons why you should go serverless, mistakes in migration, cloud managed services, and more. Edgar Rivera will introduce Cloud Run & Knative using demos.

content.description: Explore serverless fails at this virtual meetup: Sheen Brisals - From Oops to Ops: Sloppy Little Serverless Stories, Jeremy Daly - How to Fail on Serverless, Erica Windisch - Gmail was Cheaper

content.description: In this session, James Beswick will discuss how to think about which strategy is right for your application and how to build a fully event-driven application.

content.description: In this talk, we will talk about specific problems around FaaS and possible solutions to those. The talk will be in Turkish.

content.event: Patterns and Practices for Building Resilient AWS Serverless Applications
content.description: In this talk, we will look at a number of practices and architectural patterns that can help you build more resilient serverless applications.

content.description: Learn the best ways to get started with your serverless development journey and why serverless computing is changing the cloud landscape.

content.event: How Vonage Reduces Troubleshooting Time and Deploys Features 2x Faster with Epsagon
content.description: As microservices-based applications become more and more complex, the lack of end-to-end visibility can make it difficult to discover and solve issues quickly.
In this talk, AWS Data Hero and author of the DynamoDB Book, Alex DeBrie, breaks down what makes DynamoDB's abstractions uniquely powerful for your cloud-native applications.
Join to hear Yan Cui speak about building a social media site with Lambda, DynamoDB and AppSync and receive pro-tips for implementing DynamoDB in serverless applications from Alex Debrie.

content.event: AWS Step Functions: Workflows for serverless apps and more
content.description: In this session, an AWS Solutions Architect will walk you through designing workflows for serverless and instance-based apps, and will show you how to use Step Functions.
